title: The Last Bite of Saffron
premise: When a world-renowned, notoriously cruel food critic drops dead after tasting a perfect, yet impossible, dish at an exclusive underground supper club, disgraced former chef and current food-truck owner Elara Vance must investigate. The fatal dish was a flawless replica of a legendary recipe lost with her mentor's death a decade ago—a death she was accused of causing. To clear her name for good, she must navigate the cutthroat world of high-stakes gastronomy, where every chef is a suspect, and the secret ingredient might just be murder.
protagonist: Elara Vance, a brilliant but embittered culinary prodigy running from her past.
conflict: Elara must solve the critic's murder and uncover the truth behind her mentor's stolen recipe, all while proving her own innocence against a police detective convinced she's a repeat offender.
setting: Present-day Portland, Oregon's vibrant, competitive, and secretive high-end food scene.
tone: Atmospheric and suspenseful, with a sharp, mouth-watering edge of culinary detail and simmering personal stakes.
